narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Banyan Delaware LLC is a Clinic/Center, Rehabilitation, Substance Use Disorder provider based in Milford, DE. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $30.8M in Medicaid payments across 105K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $30.8M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
